Darkfate::
Darkfate::


Darkfate said "I'll help you to destroy the base... with out destroy 
our troops -You see, i have a Little think that Trainers, our 
enemies, don't know...  and that can help us to destroy them whitout 
wast our time and lost allies -allies are dificult to find in this 
times... if we work together, we'll destroy them in a shot time... If 
we don't, we will destroy them and it will take so long... And I 
guess that you want end with this battle as soon as possible , am I 
right?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Hellpeon shakes his head to Darkfate as he asks about a spark 
> signature.
> 
> Hellpeon: "Our bodies and sparks are created of Chaochitan energy 
and 
> thus we are one. As for your troops in the base... they are 
> expendable, I am expendable, you are expendable, all are expendable 
> in the eyes of the Bamphomet. It is the only being that is not 
> expendable. Therefore if your troops are in the base when it is 
> destroyed, they will not be thought of for another second. Now will 
> you help in destroying all in that base and the base itself and 
revel 
> and the powers and gifts of the Bamphomet or shall you stand in our 
> way and ultimately be obliterated?"
